mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_WRITER) VALUES (#{NOTICE_TITLE},#{NOTICE_CONTENT},#{NOTICE_WRITER})
mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_BNO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_REGDATE FROM( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(NOTICE PK_NOTICE) */ ROWNUM AS RN, NOTICE_BNO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_WRITER, NOTICE_REGDATE FROM NOTICE WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
